verbs.description: CNN — President Donald Trump [V: will] welcome hero pilot Tammie Jo Shults and other crewmembers and passengers from Southwest Airlines Flight 1380 to the Oval Office on Tuesday , recognizing the work of those in the cabin and the cockpit following catastrophic engine failure .

[ARGM-DIS: CNN] — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: welcome] [ARG1: hero pilot Tammie Jo Shults and other crewmembers and passengers from Southwest Airlines Flight 1380] [ARG2: to the Oval Office] [ARGM-TMP: on Tuesday] , [ARGM-ADV: recognizing the work of those in the cabin and the cockpit following catastrophic engine failure] .

CNN — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] will welcome hero pilot Tammie Jo Shults and other crewmembers and passengers from Southwest Airlines Flight 1380 to the Oval Office on Tuesday , [V: recognizing] [ARG1: the work of those in the cabin and the cockpit following catastrophic engine failure] .

CNN — President Donald Trump will welcome hero pilot Tammie Jo Shults and other crewmembers and passengers from Southwest Airlines Flight 1380 to the Oval Office on Tuesday , recognizing the work of those in the cabin and the cockpit [V: following] [ARG2: catastrophic engine failure] .
